K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:201b-10: sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags khri dag gis ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:201b-12: nyan thos dag gis 'dul ba'i srog chags brgyad khri dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:201b-13: nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:201b-14: lha'i bu khri dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:201b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-2: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag pa nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i bar du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-3: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-6: dri za'i rgyal po'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas de ltar 'tshal zhes lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar mnyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-7: dri za sa ya phrag drug dang lhan cig tu rgyud kyi dbyangs dang; klu'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-9: glu sgra de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po'i klu'i rgyal po dag rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi gnas nas byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-10: de dag byung bas rgya mtsho chen po na 'byung po chen po dag gi gnas rnam par 'khrugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-11: klu'i rgyal po mdzes pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag brgya dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-12: klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202a-14: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bskyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-0: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu @202b dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-1: klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir bskyod do; ;klu'i rgyal po autpal mig la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir bskyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-2: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu nas de bzhin du sbyar te thams cad la'ang bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-3: klu'i rgyal po nye dga' la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-4: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-5: klu'i rgyal po ae la'i r'a ba na la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-6: klu'i rgyal po chab pa'i bu la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-7: klu'i rgyal po mi nag pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-8: klu'i rgyal po goo ta ma la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-9: klu'i rgyal po kam pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-10: klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-11: klu'i rgyal po mgrin sngon la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-12: klu'i rgyal po gser mgrin la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:202b-13: klu'i rgyal po 'jigs sgrol la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-0: klu'i rgyal po gzi can la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu @203a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-2: klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-3: klu'i rgyal po rdul bral la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-4: klu'i rgyal po 'od chen la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-5: klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdung byed la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-6: klu'i rgyal po stobs chen la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-7: klu'i rgyal po sprin chen la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-8: klu'i rgyal po zla chen la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-9: rlung yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang; klu'i rgyal po shugs 'dzin la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-10: klu'i rgyal po sprin chen la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-11: klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdul dka' la sogs pa dang; klu'i rgyal po thams cad me long zhes bya ba klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-12: klu'i rgyal po char chen spyod la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-13: de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-14: 'khor dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-15: de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po dkrugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203a-16: dge slong de dag gis kyang grong khyer dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-2: ri 'or sa dang bcas pa dkrugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-3: de nas sa rnam pa du mar g-yos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-11: kun tu rab tu ldeg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-12: de nas khyim bdag phyva mkhan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-14: myang ba bzang zhing rab tu mang po rang gi lag gis yang dag par tshim par byas shing yang dag par brims so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa; dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-16: su'i bsod snyoms kyang yongs su bza' bar mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-17: grong khyer chen po dge ba'i pha rol 'gro ba 'di klu dkrugs pa dag gis grong khyer ma rung par byas sa re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms bzhes nas nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-21: ngang pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun phyir bkye nas gnas su sprul pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:203b-23: der klu'i rgyal po gang dag bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-0: klu'i rgyal po gang dag bcom ldan 'das la ma dad cing blta bar @204a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-1: mi 'dod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-2: der klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-3: klu bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-4: sangs rgyas la dad pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-5: de dag dad pa thob ma thag tu klu'i skye gnas de nas shi ste bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa de dag btul nas bsod snyoms bzhes te bar snang la gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-7: de'i tshe na yul lag mthil ltar mnyam pa na dka' thub can mes byin zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i bar snang las gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-9: de mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu gus pa bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-11: bdag la mtshan ma'i rnam pa de bzhin du mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-12: gang bdag gi gnas 'dir bzhugs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can mes byin gyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-0: skye bo phyi ma dag nyid la @204b thugs brtse ba'i slad du rdo leb la zhabs bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ral pa can mes byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-3: khyod kyi sems dad par bya ba'i don du 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-7: ma dros pa'i mtsho ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-10: zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas kyi chu 'gram du bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-11: de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gshegs par rig nas gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-17: rdo'i snying po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i stan lnga brgya tsam zhig mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-18: khri stan lnga brgya de dag gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdan bshams te klu'i ras bcos bus g-yogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:204b-19: de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa klu'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po zan zos shing lhung bzed @205a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-1: dang lag pa bkrus par thugs su chud nas bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-3: song la gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu khyod la ston pa 'bod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-8: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-10: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa brkyang ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-11: brkyang ba bskum pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po ma dros pa'i mtshon nas byung ste rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i mdun na 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-12: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu snam sbyar 'drub par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang lhan cig tu yang dag par dga' ba'i gtam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-14: gtam snyan pa rnam pa mang po byas nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-16: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod la 'bod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-17: ston pa khyod la mngon par dgyes kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-18: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshur shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-19: ston pa khyod la gsung gi 'dod ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-20: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205a-21: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-0: tshe dang ldan moonggal gyi bu @205b chen po;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos sor mo lnga kha ba lngar mngon par sprul nas snam sbyar de btsems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-4: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-7: snam sbyar btsem par bya ba 'di myur du btsem par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-10: zin pa nyid du gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-11: de ma thag tu drub cing zin pa nyid du byas nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-12: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-20: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-21: re zhig ska rags 'di stobs kyis khyer nus dang nga stobs kyis khyer bar shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-22: des ska rags de 'jig rten gyi khams bdun du byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-23: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos ska rags de rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bteg pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g-yos kyang ska rags de gdeg par ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-24: de nas ma dros pa'i mtsho rlabs shin tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:205b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-0: 'jig rten du dog sa chen po g-yos pa @206a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-3: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis rta thul la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-5: nyan thos chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-7: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-10: de skad smras nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-11: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-13: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu mngon du phyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pas de dang por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan ma de lta bu byung ba mdzad pa'i mtshan ma ji lta bu byung ba mdzad pas rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po mdzes dags 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-16: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206a-17: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-0: ngas zhu ba lung bstan @206b pa'i phyir 'di ltar thams cad skabs dbye bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-2: ston pa bde sbyin mdzad la zhu ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-3: spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-4: bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-5: bde gshegs sbyin mdzad de ni lung bstan gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-6: ma dros klu yi 'jig rten mgon de la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-7: zhus pa bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-8: dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bus yid zhi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-9: gang gi bde bas bde bar gshegs pa bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-10: sngon gyi srid par spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-11: skye bo thams cad bde bas bde ldan byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-12: de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-13: bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-14: ston pa'i gsung gis mdzes pa de dga' nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-15: de yi skad cig sa steng pus btsugs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-16: gzhal med dga' yis sems ni dang bas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-17: 'jig rten sgron ma 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-18: ston pa'i blo yis mkhas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-19: 'gro ba kun las nges 'byung phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-20: 'jigs med blo dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-21: bde gshegs gzhan min gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-22: de nas klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-23: 'od mdzad spyan sdug legs pa'i spyan mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-24: blo dge nyon mongs tshogs las rnam grol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:206b-25: ye shes dri med spyod yul khyod la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-0: @207a *// spyad pa spyod tshe rnam thar bla med zhu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-1: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-2: ji ltar spyad na byang chub zhi 'tshal zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-3: mi mchog dam pa bdag gi spyod spyod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-4: yid 'das de dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-5: rgyal ba de yis rdul bcom dbang po bsdams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-6: 'dod pa'i 'ching las thugs ni rnam grol ba'i; ;dgongs pa'i de nyid sems kyi rjes 'jug pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-7: thugs zhim dkrugs des ni lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-8: mkhas pas dge ba dag ni spyad pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-9: srog gi phyir yang yid ni mi ldog cing; ;rtag tu spyod tshe nyon mongs med yid kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-10: lus dang dag gi dge ba mnyam spyod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-11: de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-12: 'khor ba'i 'gro la spyod pa rnam dag ste; ;chu yi nang nas padma skye ba ltag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-13: gos pa med cing byang chub yang dag 'grub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-14: bde gshegs gsung gis lha yi mdzes pa klu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-15: de ni dga' zhing legs par mgu bas su; ;de yi skad cig sa la pus btsugs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-16: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-17: thub pa 'jig rten kun la sman mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-18: blo gros nges par zhi la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-19: spyad pa spyod tshe khyod kyi rjes slob cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-20: byang chub mi g-yo yid ni bskyed par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207a-21: sems can don du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-0: lus dang srog ni de bzhin @207b btang nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-1: sdug bsngal thar byed sangs rgyas 'gyur ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-2: byang chub zhi pa bla med thob pa'i bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-3: klu de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-4: rgyal ba dgra las rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-5: de tshe ji ltar gangg'a'i bye snyed kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-6: sangs rgyas mtha' yas zhing ni 'od kyis khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-7: bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa bstan pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-8: nam mkha'i lhas rig legs so zhes gsol te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-9: ae ma'o rgyal bas rdul bcom dbang po bsgoms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-10: khyod dang mnyam med gong na yong ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-11: sangs rgyas zhing mang dag ni rab g-yo sa shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-12: 'dod pa'i lha ni sder bcas shin tu rmongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-13: lha tshogs mang po bsam pa rab dga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-14: rgyal ba dbang po thub la phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-15: ston pa'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog moonggal bu yis rgyal la yongs zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-16: gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'dzum mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-17: bcom ldan bde gshegs rgyu gang rkyen gang lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-18: moonggal bu yis rgyal la nyer zhus pa; ;the tshom gcod mdzad rgyal bas bka' stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-19: nga la mchod pa byed pa'i klu 'di ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-20: ma 'ongs pa yi dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-21: ji snyed zhing 'di 'ong kyis khyab pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-22: de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing gcig 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-23: des na rgyal pa 'di ltar 'gyur ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:207b-24: 'dren pa de ming dbang po rgyal mtshan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-2: des ni 'gro srid pha rol sgrol byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-3: 'di la brten nas ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-4: moonggal bu khyod de ltar shes par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-5: klu de lung bstan pa ni thos nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-6: bla na med pa dag gi dga' bas khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-7: lung bstan thos nas bar snang 'di las ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-8: ta la brgyad cu srid du mngon par 'phags; ;phyogs bcu dag na rnam dag rgyal ba'i zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-9: bzang la grangs med sangs rgyas de mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-10: mthong nas sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog dag la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-11: tshigs bcad sna tshogs dag gis rgyal ba bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-12: 'gro ba phan skyed rgyal ba dgra las rgyal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-13: dbang po thul cing ma nor de bzhin gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-14: 'od mdzad bden gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-15: bde gshegs tshig rmongs med la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-16: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa; ;'jigs sel sngags grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-17: spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-18: 'jigs las grol dang 'gro ba thar bgyid pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-19: 'jigs sel lam zhugs bdag la bka' stsal gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-20: ji ltar 'dren pa bdag nyid 'jigs grol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208a-21: skye bo 'jigs las rab tu grol mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-0: khyos kyis legs @208b par gsungs pa'i bka' thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-1: de bzhin ngoms med yid kyis spyad par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-2: rgyu chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgya mtsho des //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-3: 'gro la phan phyir ston la zhu byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-4: 'jigs bcas zhe sar bcas shing de brten nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-5: mi dbang spyan sngar zhe sar bcas pas 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-6: de yi bsam pa 'dren pas thugs chud nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-7: ji ltar spyad na 'jigs dang rnam bral zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-8: sems can dag kyang 'jigs las thar byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-9: yan lag brgyad ldan gsung gis lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-10: byang chub spyad pa rjes su spyod bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-11: dbyug mtshon med pas 'gro la rab tu ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-12: chu dang thang dang de bzhin g-yul 'thab pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-13: 'jigs la yang dang yang du 'jigs med sbyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-14: de yis legs pa'i las ni byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-15: 'jigs par mi 'gro byang chub reg 'gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-16: mnyam par bzhag pa'i byams pa'i sems kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-17: shin tu mi bzad bdud stobs rab skrag byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-18: stobs bcu'i mkhyen pas rgya mtsho de dga' nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-19: de yi skad cig sa la pus btsugs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-20: 'jigs par mi gnas zhi bar rab 'dug nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-21: bde bar gshegs la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-22: srid kun bdag la mi gnas phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-23: dngang med 'jigs bral ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:208b-24: dngang dang 'jigs las skye bo bsgral bgyi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-2: de nas klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa; drang srong chen po spyan dge dbang po thul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-3: srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal cing pha rol phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-4: skam la bzhugs pa sred bskams gang zag mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-5: 'gro ba'i don phyir khyod zhu bka' stsal gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-6: ji ltar spyad na bde gshegs bdag skye zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-7: rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu gnas gyur dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-8: bdud phrag stong dag gis kyang mi bskyod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-9: kun spyan 'di dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-10: sangs rgyas tshul la mi g-yo rab gnas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-11: klu yi gtso bos 'dren la de zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-12: klu yi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chud nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-13: nyon mongs kun spangs de ni lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-14: lhag pa'i bsam pas chos kyi nges ldan zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-15: nges pa stong pa'i yul la rab tu gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-16: srid las rnam rgyal bstan la mi g-yo zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-17: gzhal med byang chub la ni 'dun pa bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-18: gser gtsug rdzu 'phrul che ba'i klu de ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-19: sangs rgyas gsung pa thos nas the tshom med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-20: byang chub phyir ni mi g-yo yid bskyed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-21: 'jigs kun pha rol phyin la mngon par bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-22: srid mtsho rgal cing skam la shin tu bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209a-23: the tshom mi mnga' mi g-yo brtan brnyes shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-0: @209b srid par 'khor brtan bzhin du rab bzhugs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-1: ri rab ri la lha yi gnas bcas bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-2: 'di ltar mi g-yo ba la skyabs mchi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-3: mi g-yo ri lta bur ni 'gyur bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-4: de'i tshe 'gul dang mi 'gul zhing mi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-5: mi g-yo ri rab lta bur 'gyur bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-6: ma smad pas ni de yi thugs chud nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-7: yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-8: bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cur spyad byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-9: ma 'ongs pa yi dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-10: bde ba'i lam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-11: mtshan ni legs mthong zhes bya shin tu sdug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-12: srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-13: bsil ba bde ba zhi ba'i lam 'god 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-14: rgyal bas gsungs pa klu des thos nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-15: gzhal med dga' ba'i sems ni rab dang bas nyon mongs thams cad sel cing ma smad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-16: 'gro ba'i 'dren pa la ni phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-17: de nas klu'i rgyal po autpal mig gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-18: mi mchog 'dul mdzad gzi brjid mtha' yas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-19: thugs rab zhi zhing nyer zhi pha rol gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-20: zhi gnas yon tan rab zhi rnam grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-21: zhi ba mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-22: khyod sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:209b-23: zhi gnas dga' zhing zhi gnas bsten pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-0: zhi gnas la ni ji ltar mkhas @210a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-2: kun gzigs myur du bdag gi som nyi khum //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-3: rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-4: rgyal bas autpal mig la lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-5: gang gis dge ba'i las kyi yid 'ong ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-6: zhi gnas la ni shin tu bslab par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-7: de phyir byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-8: spyad pa spyod tshe sems g-yor mi byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-9: bskal pa bye bar zhi gnas sten byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-10: byang chub dam pa dpa' mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-11: de yid rab zhi byang chub rtogs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-12: rnam 'dren 'gro ba zhi la sbyor byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-13: rab tu sems zhi g-yo bar mi 'gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-14: sems can nyon mongs mi g-yo zhi bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-15: des pa autpal mig gi klu des ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-16: rgyal bas legs par gsungs pa'i tshig thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-17: nyon mongs kun g-yo yid ni zhi gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-18: byang chub mchog rab sems ni bskyed gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-19: de yi zhi gnas sems la brten nas su; ;byang chub sems bskyed rgyal ba de la bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-20: khyod la bskyed nas zhi gnas rtogs gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-21: shin tu yid zhi sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-22: de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210a-23: bde bar gshegs pa zhi gnas thugs su chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-0: rgyal ba gang zag @210b mchog la bdag zhu ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-1: khyod nyid las 'khrungs byang chub rab gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-2: mi mchog ji ltar lhag mthong dag la spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-3: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la dga' bos zhus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-4: klu de'i sngon gyi mtha' ni gzigs pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-5: dge ba'i las bsags pa dag thugs chud nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-6: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba 'di skad gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-7: ye shes dam pa byang chub mchog btsal phyir; ;ma zhum yid kyis nor dang 'bru dag la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-8: ser sna med cing rdzas mang mi nyung dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-9: chung ma dang ni bdag nyid gtong bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-10: de yis legs pa'i las de byas pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-11: gtong ba shin tu sdug bsngal bsten pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-12: ye shes dam pa bdag rgyal sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-13: de ni lhag mthong spyad pa'i 'bras bu yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-14: de nas klu'i rgyal po nyer dags bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-15: 'gro ba kun gyi 'dren la bdag zhu ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-16: khyod sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-17: zhi gnas lhag mthong mnyam par spyod pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-18: zang zing med zhi byang chub 'thob 'gyur lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-19: 'dren pa de la klu des zhus pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-20: zhi gnas lhag mthong yang dag len mkhyen pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-21: thogs pa med pa 'dren pa 'di brnyes pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-22: de ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la bzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:210b-23: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig spyad spyod tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-0: @211a *// gnyis ka'i stobs 'di mnyam par bsten pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-1: de ni bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-2: 'gro ba'i don du mnyam par rnam par spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-3: bskal pa bye ba mang po de 'tshang rgya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-4: zhing gi dam pa dag kyang 'god 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-5: de'i mtha' bsngags pa bskal pa bye mang du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-6: sangs rgyas bye bas zad par de mi spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-7: de tshe klu yi bdag po nye dga' yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-8: theg pa mnyam pa'i bsngags pa thos nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-9: gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems bde nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-10: byang chub mchog gi sems rab bskyed gyur to; ;'jig rten phan phyir byang chub de lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-11: ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-12: ming ni rgyal ba 'dren pa kun spyan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-13: srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-14: de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-15: bde gshegs khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-16: 'gro ba'i don du phan pa tshol byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-17: byang chub bla ma tshol la mi skyo ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-18: rkang gnyis dam pa mchog gis de lung ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-19: mi yi khyu mchog la ni klus zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-20: klu yi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chud de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-21: thub pa sngon mtha' sbyor la mi 'jigs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-22: klu yi bdag po'i the tshom lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211a-23: byang chub zhi ba spyad pa spyod 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-0: des shing @211b nyams pa med par spyod pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-1: bdag dang gzhan dag la yang mi gnod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-2: ser sna med cing gtong ldan rgyal ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-3: de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-4: 'gro ba gang gi 'khor bar bde 'dod la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-5: des shing thams cad du ni snying rjer ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-6: nor byin pas ni sdud pa byed par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-7: de yis legs pa'i lam de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-8: nam du'ang skye ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-9: rtag tu bde bas skye bo bder 'god la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-10: kha na ma tho med cing gnas zhir 'jog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-11: ston pa'i gsung gis klu de bskul bas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-12: mchog tu dga' bas sems ni bder gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-13: de yis skad cig sa la pus btsugs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-14: tshigs bcad sna tshogs dag gis rgyal bstod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-15: goo tam 'jig rten kun na mnyam med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-16: 'gro ba zil mnan bde gshegs lhang nge ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-17: khyod kyi zhal du lhar bcas 'gro kun lta //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-18: 'di ltar thal mo spyar nas skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-19: byang chub mchog gi yid ni bskyed bgyi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-20: 'di ltar bde gshegs khyod kyi ye shes dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-21: ston pa khyod kyis the tshom bsal ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-22: bdag kyang thos nas 'jig rten the tshom bsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-23: de nas de'i ston gzhal med byang chub phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-24: yid ni shin tu dgyes nas bka' stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-25: 'jig rten phan phyir 'dren par 'gyur ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:211b-26: mi mchog ming ni dbang po chen po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-1: rgyal po ae ra ba nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-2: 'jig rten dpag med mang po'i skyabs kyi mchog rgyal ba the tshom gcod la zhu bgyi ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-3: byang chub sems dpas su ga las ci bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-4: sangs rgyas mngon du lhan cig phrad ba 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-5: 'jig rten mgon po de la klus zhus nas; ;'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pas lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-6: sems can rgyud la nyon mongs rnam rig dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-7: yongs su dul ba'i yid ni rnam shes nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-8: 'gro la phan phyir snying rje bskyed nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-9: byang chub mchog gi don du spyad pa spong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-10: bdag dang rgyal bar ji ltar phrad snyam nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-11: thabs la mkhas par mngon par rab gnas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-12: rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs mya ngan 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-13: sku gdung dag la gzhal med mchod byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-14: rnam grol yid kyis smon lam 'debs par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-15: de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-16: rtag tu sangs rgyas mngon par phrad thob ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-17: rgyal ba mngon sum mchod pa byas nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-18: byang chub dga' ba 'od ldan reg par 'gyur; ;sangs rgyas kyis ni legs gsungs tshig thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-19: aer ba na klu ni yid mgu ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212a-20: gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems bde nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-0: dang ba'i yid kyis @212b sangs rgyas mngon bstod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-1: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-2: khyod kyis bdag gi som nyi the tshom bsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-3: byang chub don du yid 'di bskyed bgyi ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-4: sdug bsngal mthar bgyid sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-5: gang zag bdag gis klu yi bdag po yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-6: bsam pa thugs chud byang chub lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-7: bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-8: spyod pa spyad nas de nas sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-9: mi mchog mtshan ni thams cad sgrol ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-10: srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-11: de yi ring bsrel mang por 'gyur ba ste; ;skye bo mang po mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-12: klu de ston pa'i gsung gis dga' gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-13: 'jig rten phan mdzad rnam 'dren mngon bstod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-14: khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don ni rgya cher mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-15: sdug bsngal mthar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-17: de nas klu'i rgyal po tshib ba'i bus bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-18: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten don slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-19: 'jig rten don mdzad rnam 'dren la zhu ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-20: spyod pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-21: ma rtogs rtogs nas rgyal ba rnam 'dren 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:212b-22: tshib pa'i bu des rgyal la mngon zhus nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-0: nyon mongs thams cad bsal bas lung @213a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-2: dge ba'i las kyis 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-3: nyon mongs bcom pas des na rgyal zhes bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-4: de ni 'gro kun tshe dang sangs rgyas la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-5: mchog tu dad pa dag gi sems kyang shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-6: de yis las kyi lam de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-7: 'gro ba'i rtag pa rgyal ba dag tu 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-8: de yis rgyal ba'i bshad pa thos nas su; ;'gro ba thams cad la ni dad par byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-9: de tshe de yis dge ba byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-10: 'di yi smon lam btab ltar bdag 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-11: de nas 'jig rten mgon pos de lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-12: mi mchog sangs rgyas su ni 'gyur ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-13: srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-14: spyad pa spyod tshe rgyal ba mngon par bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-15: ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-16: sangs rgyas la ni dad bskyed mngon bstod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-17: 'gro ba thar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-18: bsam yas bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-19: de nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-20: drang srong chen po skyabs mchog dpag tu med; ;skyon dang bral zhing yon tan mchog brnyes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-21: stobs bcu'i 'jigs pas rnam gnod khyod la ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213a-22: byang chub zhi spyod mkhas pa rab gnas zhu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-0: @213b des pa'i nyon mongs ji ltar bsal ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-1: rgyal ba'i mchog nyid ji ltar bsgom par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-2: bdud kyi spyod yul de dag ji ltar spang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-3: sangs rgyas spyod yul dag la ji ltar spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-4: rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-5: ji ltar bde gshegs spyod yul spyad pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-6: ji ltar bdud kyi spyod yul spang ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-7: lam gnyis shin tu mkhyen pas rab tu bsten ston pa la ni klu bdag des zhus nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-8: de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-9: mi mkhas gang dag sems can 'du shes spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-10: de dag nag po'i rtsa lag spyod yul spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-11: gang dag sems can med cing yid mi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-12: de dag thams cad gzigs pa'i spyod yul spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-13: nag po'i rtsa lag dag las rgyal nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-14: byang chub bla med zhi ba des thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-15: ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-16: bdud kyi spyod yul myur par rnam spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs ltar spyod yul dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-18: bsten pas de ni myur du rgyal bar 'gyur; ;de nas klu'i rgyal po goo ta mas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-19: kha lo sgyur mchog khyod la zhu bgyi ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-20: 'dren pa khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-21: klu yi skye gnas dag ni gcod bgyid cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-22: sangs rgyas tshul gyi myu gu skyed par bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:213b-23: bde bar gshegs la klu des zhus pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-2: sems can med la rgyal ba'i sras spyod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-3: byang chub sems la nam yang de mi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-4: de ni stong nyid khong du chud pa yin; ;mkhas pa mtshan ma smon lam rnams spangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-5: mdzangs pa mi dmigs pa la gnas bdag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-6: 'di ni sangs rgyas chos mngon myu gu bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-7: ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-8: mi dmigs pa la brten par rab gnas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-9: bdud kyi zhags bcings dam pa bcad nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-10: sangs rgyas tshul la klu ni rab tu gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-11: 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-12: ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-13: rnam thar rgyal zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-14: bdud kyi dbang song srog chags thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-15: ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-16: thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-17: khyod kyi lam bstan pas na sangs rgyas bsten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-18: mi mchog thar mdzad zhing la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-19: de nas klu'i rgyal po ka ma pa la'i sgras bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-20: zla ba'i 'od ltar dri med mthu che zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-21: mi mchog rang byung gyur la zhu bgyi ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-22: rnam 'dren sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214a-23: phan par 'jug cing rjes su skye bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-0: gal te stong @214b nyid smon med rjes song zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-1: phung po mtshan mo mi ldan bral pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-2: nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos dang rnam shes na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-3: pha yi lam du bu yang rjes 'gro 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-4: ston pas legs par gsungs pa de dga' nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-5: dmigs su med pa yin sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-6: 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-7: rjes su mthun 'di spyod pa spyad byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-8: zhing mchog dag kyang yongs su sbyangs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-9: ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-10: zla bas lhag par phyogs su rnam grags shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-11: srid par 'gro ba'i sems can thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-12: kam pa la zhes ming btags klu de ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-13: sh'akya sras mkhas byang chub lung bstan nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-14: sems ni dga' zhing yongs su yid mgu ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-15: 'gro kun thar par mdzad la mngon bstod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-16: thub pa che la 'di ltar skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-17: sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the tshom bdag ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-18: mun pa dag la sgron ma gzung bgyi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-19: long ba mig ma mchis la lam bstan bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-20: de nas klu'i bdag po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-21: mgon po 'jig rten long bar gyur ba'i mig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-22: mig sbyin sman pa drang srong che la zhu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-23: gang gis 'jig rten rnam thar lam bzang zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:214b-24: zhi ba'i sar mchis rkang gnyis dbang po gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-0: stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' rnam thar lam @215a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-2: 'jig rten mgon po rkang gnyis dbang pos de lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-3: gang gis yun ring bzhugs pa'i sdug bsngal lam zhi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-4: 'khor ba nyer zhi mya ngan 'das pa gsal bar 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-5: ston la klu yi rgyal po lam zhi thos nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-6: sdug bsngal ba la snying rje dam pa bskyed byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-7: klu yi rgyal pos byang chub 'dun pa drag bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-8: stobs bcu'i stobs 'chang 'jig rten mgon du bdag 'gyur byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-9: stobs bcu'i yon tan mnga' bas klu dbang lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-10: mi yi sengge bdag nyid mu stegs dgrar 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-11: sems can mtha' yas dpag med 'khor bar 'gro ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-12: bde gshegs mchog gi tshig gis 'dren cing thar par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-13: ston pa'i gsung mchog klu yi rgyal pos thos nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-14: dga' ba'i sems kyis sor bcu'i rtse mo thal sbyar te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-15: mi dbang 'jig rten mgon po drang srong chen po la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-16: gus pa bskyed nas 'khrul med tshig gis mngon bstod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-17: skyabs mchog shin tu thugs gzhungs mtshungs med ye shes tog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-18: 'gro ba'i dge ba spyod cing dge la yun ring dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-19: 'gro ba'i bsam pa mtha' yas khyod kyis thugs chud pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215a-20: des na mi dbang khyod ni 'jig rten rgya cher grags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-0: de nas klu'i rgyal po gser mgrin gyis bcom ldan 'das la @215b tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-1: stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' stobs che stobs dang ldan pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-2: thugs dge snang mdzad 'od dang ldan zhing sdig mi mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-3: srid rgyal blo gros bzang bas 'gro ba shin tu mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-4: rgyal ba dge sbyong shin tu dri med zhal gsungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-5: mi mchog rdul bral khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-6: mkhas pa ma dkrugs ma bskyod pa dag thugs chud cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-7: rgyal ba rdul bral dpag med brgya ni yongs su mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-8: rgyal sras skye bo phan mdzad thugs su chud pa'i spyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-9: blo gros dpag med mnga' ba lha mi mkhas pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-10: bla mar bgyis shing rgyal ba dpag med sa yas bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-11: mkhas pa dus su 'gro ba dpag med phan mdzad dgongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-12: stobs bcu mnga' ba klu yi 'gro ba zhus pa gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-13: blo 'chal bral zhing blo gtsang rjes dgongs brtag pa mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-14: nga yi sras mchog rgyal bsten rga shi zad byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-15: 'thob cing rgyal bas mchod cing rdul med skyon bral re //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-16: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dpag med brgya shes yongs su 'grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-17: stobs bcu blo gros mnga' bas klu yi bdag po yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-18: rga shi zad bya thos nas rab tu yid dga' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-19: 'gro la phan yid byang chub yid byas rgyal ba'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:215b-20: rnam 'dren blo mnga' 'gro la phan mdzad mngon bstod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-0: 'gro ba mang po'i mun pa rab rib ling @216a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-2: gcod mdzad 'gro 'di'i sdug bsngal 'joms shing mun pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-3: rab rib ling tog kun nas sel mdzad bdud rtsi'i lam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-4: shin tu dri med spyan mnga' dge ba phyogs bcur ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-5: klu yi bdag po'i gser dngul lta bu'i khyim gshegs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-6: yon tan dpag med mnga' ba shin tu thugs su chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-7: blo gros ston mdzad 'od zer stong 'dra'i spyan mnga' zhal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-8: ma 'khrul ma blong ma smad gzi che mkhas pa'i gzi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-9: stobs bcu 'od chen mnga' la 'gro ba'i tshig gis bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-10: rgyal mchog bdag nyid bde ldan sangs rgyas byang chub nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-11: 'gro ba 'khyams shing mngon med rga shi sdug bsngal gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-12: nyam thag sdug bsngal dpag med bsal te thar par bgyi;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-13: bde dang zhi dang zhi ba rdul med rgya che sel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-14: zhi ba'i lam du zhugs nas bdag ni sangs rgyas bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-15: rgyal ba brgya yis thugs chud bdud kyi stobs dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-16: stobs med bgyi zhing mi mkhas pa dag gzhug par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-17: de nas klu'i rgyal po mgrin sngon gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-18: ston mchog 'dul ba kha lo sgyur la zhu bgyi ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-19: 'dren pa khyod kyi sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216a-20: kha na ma tho med cing zhi la rdul bral dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-0: nyon mongs med cing byang chub dam pa @216b sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-1: 'gro ba'i don du 'dren pas gsungs pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-2: dpa' bo khyod nyid las 'khrungs sras thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-3: kha na ma tho med cing bdag dang gzhan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-4: sangs rgyas 'gyur dang byang chub the tshom khum //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-5: mgrin sngon klu de yis ni zhus pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-6: 'jig rten kun la chags pa med pa'i thugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-7: chos rnams kun la mi 'jigs dbang brnyes shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-8: ston pa'i gsung la legs gnas lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-9: nga sras 'jig rten gsum la ma chags shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-10: 'gro la phan par spyad pa spyod byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-11: 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-12: gzugs med khams su'ang ched du mi skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-13: mya ngan 'das dbyings gzhal med 'dus ma byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-14: thams cad kyi ni sdug bsngal zad cing 'gog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-15: de ni nyer bzung 'jig rten gos med yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-16: rgyal ba rgyal ba'i dbang po rab tu sgom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-17: de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-18: gos pa med cing 'jigs med rnam spyod la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-19: bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa med gnas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-20: bdag nyid bla med byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-21: de ni rnam smin de las rjes mthun pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-22: shin tu dga' bas byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-23: de yi skye bo srog chags lha dang klu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-24: mi dang srin po dag gis mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:216b-25: klu mgrin sngon po stobs po che de ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-0: sangs rgyas kun mkhyen gsung gis @217a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-2: sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar mgo btud de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-3: 'jig rten sgron mdzad 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-4: mi mchog la ni 'di ltar bdag skyabs mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-5: yab kyi rjes su sras kyang mchi bgyi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-6: mthar bgyid bcom la byang chub 'tshang rgyar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-7: sems can sdug bsngal chos kyis gnod gyur dgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-8: 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-9: khyod ni ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-10: kun tu spyan zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-11: 'gro ba'i srid las sems can grol bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-12: de nas klu'i rgyal po 'jigs sgrog gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-13: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba yid las 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-14: ston pa sug las ci bgyis bdag zhu 'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-15: rgyal ba de ni snam phyogs gzigs pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-16: dkyil 'khor tsam gyis ni mdun du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-17: chos la nges pa'i rgyal bas de lung bstan; ;kun mkhyen mkhyen pas bsam pa thugs chud nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-18: bla na med pa'i thugs ni bskyed mdzad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-19: de bzhin mi mchog gis ni 'di lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-20: bde ba 'byung ba dag gi las byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-21: de dag sngon chad yang dang yang dran pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-22: de yi rnam smin las ni 'di ltar shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217a-23: de yi gzigs par sa ni 'gyur ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-0: rgyal @217b bas legs gsungs tshig ni thos nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-1: klu rgyal de ni mchog tu dga' gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-2: 'phags pa'i zang zing med pa'i dga' bskyed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-3: nga rgyal bcom nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-4: de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-5: lam stor ba la lam ni rab ston cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-6: 'jig rten don mdzad 'dren la zhu bgyi ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-7: sngon tshe rtag tu 'phrin las ci mdzad na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-8: ji ltar dgongs pa bzhin du zhi gnas mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-9: 'jig rten mgon po rgyal bas de lung bstan; ;sems can klu ni gdul ba'i dus bab cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-10: 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-11: 'dren pa bdud stobs 'joms pas lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-12: 'das pa'i dus su spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-13: tshul bzhin ma yin sems dang gnyen min pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-14: nams kyang mi sems rtag tu zhi gnas bsten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-15: de la ngas ni yun ring bslab pa yin; ;de bzhin rgyal ba dag gi mchod rten la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-16: phreng ba rin chen dag ni bkram zhing phul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-17: de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-18: nyon mongs sems dang nams kyang mi gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-19: nga yis bskal pa stong phrag bye ba ru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-20: gzhan la gnod pas nams kyang gnod ma byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:217b-21: nga ni de yis las kyi rnam smin rgyus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-1: bzhin zhi gnas bsten par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-2: drang srong che bas lung bstan 'di thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-3: gzi can klu ni dga' bar gyur pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-4: gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-5: ston pa'i mdun 'dug tshigs su bcad pas bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-6: 'gro ba'i kun ldang nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-7: de dag sems zhi khyod kyi bstan pa mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-8: thub pa nyon mongs med par 'jig rten spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-9: zla 'od lta bur blo zhi phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-10: de nas klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-11: sngon tshe dag tu 'phrin las ci mdzad na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-12: thub pa khyod kyis sku la rdul mi gos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-13: dpe med rnam gnon 'di dag bdag la gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-14: gang dag thos nas dge ba'i las spyad bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-15: rnam par snang byed dge ba tshol ba'i klus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-16: 'jig rten mgon de la ni zhus pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-17: nyon mongs kun sel yan lag brgyad ldan zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-18: snyan cing 'jebs pa'i sgras ni lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-19: nga yis sngon chad byang chub tshol ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-20: nam yang tshul bzhin ma yin ngas ma bsams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-21: nam yang rab tu nyes sems ngas ma bskyed; ;bla med byams las yang dang yang du byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-22: nga yis dge ba'i las de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-23: bla med byang chub zhi ba reg nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218a-24: mi mchog rgyal ba thub pa'i sku dag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-0: @218b na bza' la yang rdul gyis mi gos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-1: rgyal ba'i 'phrin las dge bsags de thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-2: rnam par snang byed klu ni yid dga' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-3: sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas mgo bo yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-4: rgyal ba'i zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-5: legs so rgyal ba mu byed sngon du gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-6: khyod kyis rgya che mtha' yas don dag mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-7: srid pa'i tshogs la dga' zhing sdug bsngal gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-8: gdungs pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag khyod kyis bsgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-9: skye bo dug gdug reg pa'i sman pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-10: skye bo dug bcom khyod ni gso sman lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-11: me 'bar zhi ltar rim gyis mya ngan 'da'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-12: 'di ltar thal sbyar mgos btud skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-13: de nas klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-14: rnam 'dren dge ba'i 'phrin las ci mdzad na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-15: zhabs ni shin tu mnyam zhing brtan pa brnyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-16: gang dag thos nas shin tu yid dga' 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-17: mi yi mchog gyur de dag bdag la gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-18: klu yi rgyal po bsgyings pas rnam par 'dren //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-19: 'jig rten mkhas pa de yis zhus pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-20: yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-21: klu yi rgyal po yid ni dga' bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-22: nga yis tshul khrims brtul zhugs rnam dag bsgrubs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:218b-23: nga yis gzhan yang tshul khrims brtul zhugs bsgoms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-2: rkang pa mnyam pa dag gis sa la reg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-3: de tshe thams cad mkhyen pas lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-4: rdul bral klu ni yid dga' mgu gyur nas; ;gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-5: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-6: legs so rgyal pa 'od mdzad rdul bcom zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-7: shin tu nyon mongs bag chags bcas pa bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-8: zla nya'i dkyil 'khor sgra gcan gyis btang ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-9: dgra bcom nas ni phyogs rnams rab tu gsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-10: de nas klu'i rgyal po 'od chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-11: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-12: 'jig rten 'das gsung 'dren la zhu bgyi ba;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-13: rkang gnyis dam pa sug las ci bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-14: rnam 'dren gnas ma lags pa 'tshal ba 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-15: sngon tshe dag tu spyad pa spyod pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-16: lus dang ngag yid dang ni sems kyis kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-17: bde ba 'byung ba'i yang dag las byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-18: las gang byas pas nam yang gdung mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-19: rab tu dga' zhing dge bas brlan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-20: gnas ma yin pa'i lam gol thams cad ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-21: dge bcu las kyi lam gyis rnam par sbyangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219a-22: gnas ma yin pa'i nyon mongs thams cad bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-0: rnam 'dren de @219b yis las de mdzad pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-1: 'di nas 'phos nas gzhan 'phrul dag tu gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-2: mi yis 'jig rten brnyes nas der 'das te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-3: bla med gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-4: gnas ma yin pa shes la nam yang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-5: bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis bskyod mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-6: sems dang de bzhin nyon mongs yid grol te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu mkhyen; ;ston pas lung bstan pas ni 'od chen klu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-8: yid ni mgu zhing shin tu dga' gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-9: gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-10: yon tan pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-11: shin tu thugs dul yid gnyis 'joms pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-12: 'dam las rgal cing skam la shin tu bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-13: thub chen rgal cing 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-14: ji ltar nyi mas mun pa bsal nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-15: gzugs kyi rnam pa snang zhing gsal ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-16: de bzhin ston pa'i thugs ni rnam grol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-17: sems can sdug bsngal mang gnod mthar mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-18: mig sbyin gso ba'i dpyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-19: de nas klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdung byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-20: rgyal ba gser mdog 'phrin las ci mdzad na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:219b-21: dus gsum mkhyen la rab tu brtan par bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-0: nam mkha' lta bur mkhyen ldan zhu ba gyis @220a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-1: pa; ;'gro ba'i 'dren pa de dag bdag la gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-2: thogs med mkhyen pas thugs ni ma chags shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-3: som nyi gcod la the tshom sel mdzad pa; ;rgyal ba rang byung thugs kyis de'i bsam pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-4: shin tu thugs chud de ni lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-5: rtag tu dge ba dran ldan sten byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-6: nges pa'i las byas pas ni bde 'byung dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-7: rtag tu gzhan yang shes la 'jog byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-8: bdag nyid ji tsam shes pa ser sna med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-9: mkhas pa de yis las de byas pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-10: lus ni zhig nas ni gzhan 'phrul dag tu 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-11: 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha gnas dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-12: thur du 'bab cing mi yi nang du 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-13: dus gsum shes la rnam par brtse byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-14: bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang shes par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-15: pags pa srab cing blo dang ldan gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-16: bde gshegs thogs pa med pas lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-17: shin tu blo ldan mchog gis bstan thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-18: klu chen rab tu gdung byed dga' gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-19: byang chub gzhal du med la rang gnas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-20: yang dag bsngags pas mi mchog rgyal ba bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-21: dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig tu gzigs mdzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-22: las dang rnam smin de bzhin rab tu mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220a-23: sems can dag gi khyad par bde ba mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-0: bde gshegs thams cad @220b gtong la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-1: de nas klu'i rgyal po stobs chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-2: mi mchog mchog rab mkhyen rab mtha' yas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-3: mgon po rdul bral thugs ni yongs su dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-4: bdag gi som nyi myur sol the tshom yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-5: skyen par dgu ma phyir bde bar gshegs pas gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-6: ji ltar sngon tshe mi dang lha dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-7: sug las bgyis pa blo mkhas ji ltar 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-8: ji ltar bla med byang chub mchog thob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-9: bdag gis the tshom zhus pa myur bar gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-10: stobs bcu'i stobs mkhyen bdag nyid shin tu nges //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-11: rgyal la klu yis zhus myur gsung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-12: nga yis ji ltar mi yi spyod kun dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-13: dge ba'i bsam pas byang chub tshol byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-14: ji ltar yid rab dga' bas bsgrubs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-15: ji ltar skye rgu sdug bsngal gyis gnod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-16: tha ma mthong la ngan 'gror ltung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-17: nyon mongs brgya yis mun par gyur pa shes; ;der ni sems can snying pos snying rje bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-18: nga yis sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal dgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-19: thar par 'gyur ba'i lam mchog dag tu bzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-20: nga yis ngan 'gro dag gi lam ngan dgag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-21: nga yis lam mchog zhi ba rab tu bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-22: bde ba'i lam gyis byang chub zhi bar bkur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:220b-23: stobs bcu'i lam mchog rab tu bstan bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-1: ring mi dag gis ni don 'gyur bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-2: de ltar brtan pa ngas ni snying rje bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-3: drang srong chen po'i dge tshul bsgrubs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-4: mgo dang mig dang de bzhin sha dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-5: btang nas bde gshegs lam nas dpa' bo 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-6: sngon gyi dus su mi yis spyad pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-7: de tshe rmi lam lta bur rab tu mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-8: dge ba 'di dag mi yis shes pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-9: stobs bcu mnga' la mchod pa rtsol bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-10: mgon la gzhal med de bzhin dad bskyed nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-11: ji ltar 'gro kun mgon du bdag 'gyur snyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-12: ji ltar skye bo phongs tshe bdag gis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-13: stobs bcus bstan pa'i lam la gzhag par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bsten pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-15: 'dren pa dag gis spyad la rjes su bslab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-16: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-17: lam gol song ba rnams la lam mchog bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-18: 'di ltar bdag nyid chen po'i spyad spyod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-19: mi yis sngon gyi 'phrin las byas pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-20: rmi lam lta bur byas par rnam rig cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-21: de ni dran la pha rol dag la'ang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-22: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bka' ni thos nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-23: stobs chen klu ni yid dga' mgu gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-24: sor bcu'i thal mo spyi bor sbyar btud de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-25: byang chub zhi thob bya phyir rgyal ba bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221a-26: rnam par 'dren la bdag gis dad bskyed pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-0: stobs bcu'i @221b mdzad pa dag ni bdag gis bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-1: skye bo lam gol 'gro zhing mun gyur rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-2: byang chub zhi ba thob par bdag gis bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-3: de nas klu'i rgyal po sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-4: stobs bcu mnga' ba skye bo yongs grol mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-5: 'dren pa rang byung la ni bdag 'di zhu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-6: ji ltar ston pa'i sras kyis brtson bskyed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-7: zhi ba rdul med byang chub mchog 'thob 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-8: ji ltar 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus stobs kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-9: bla med byang chub byang chub sems 'thob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-10: yon tan dpag med ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-11: drang srong chen pos sras zhus lung bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-12: byang chub don du nga yis sngon spyad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-13: ji ltar 'gro ba rnams su stobs brtson bsten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-14: brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub ngas brnyes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-15: de ni nga yis cung zad bshad par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-16: 'das pa'i dus su mi bdag byung ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-17: mi yi dbang phyug mi dbang stobs 'chang zhes; ;rin chen bdun yod bu dang ldan pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-18: bdag las skyes ba khri phrag brgya dag byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-19: de tshe 'jig rten khams 'di'ang rgyas pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-20: ri bong bdag ces sangs rgyas zhing dag byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-21: der ni mi mchog rang byung byung gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-22: rin chen dpal zhes 'jig rten sgra rnams grags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:221b-23: mi mchog de yis nyan thos dge 'dun ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-2: bde gshegs mchog gi rjes skyes sras tshogs ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-3: nyon mongs khro dang nga rgyal 'chang bral ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-4: de tshe mi mchog de yi byang chub sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-5: sa ya phrag ni brgyad cu dag byung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-6: rgyal ba dpag med dag la spyad ldan zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-7: 'gro la phan phyir byang chub 'thob 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-8: de ni rnam par 'dren pa de yi ni; ;byang chub sems dpa' bdud bsten zhes bya byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-9: drang srong chen po bdud stobs rab 'joms pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-10: de yis tshogs kyi gtso bo de byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-11: de nas bdud stobs bsnyen par dka' zhes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-12: lha'i bu byung nas 'dren pa rgyal ba'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-13: de ni byang chub mchog tu gshegs pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-14: ji ltar mi reg bya phyir bar chad byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-15: sa 'di rgya mtshor bcas pa yon tan ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-16: de dag bud med tshogs kyis mngon sprul te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-17: bzang mo yon tan rab mtshog 'dzin pas bkang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-18: dga' ba'i tshig dang yid 'ong tshig smra zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-19: mig ni bzang la 'gros kyang lde ma bag can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-20: glang po'i sna ltar lag mnyam pa yi mdog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-21: yun ring dag tu brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-22: nu ma sra la legs dang ldan pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-23: ngag tshig snyan cing padma 'dra ba'i mig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-24: so yi phreng ba thags dam 'chang ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222a-25: byu ru'i mdog ltar mchu ni mdzes pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-0: bzhin dang 'gram @222b pa dag ni mdzes dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-1: bzhin gyi mdog ni zla ba dri med 'phrog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-2: 'dzum zhing tshig ni snyan pa gtong ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-3: glang mchog myos pa lta bur mdzes pa'i 'gros //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-4: ngo tsha shes pas blo gros ngan pa spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-5: nu ma sra zhing tshigs kyis zin pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-6: ri dvags rgyal po lta bur de'i lus 'chang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-7: bzang mo'i lus ngos srab cing 'jam dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-8: ri dvags rgyal po'i byin 'dra rtse 'gro zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-9: rkang pa mnyams la 'jol ba'i thabs su 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-10: 'dod chags ldang bar 'gyur ba'i bu mo dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-11: bdud kyis sa rnams thams cad gang byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-12: dmar bzung du ldan pa'i myos ma ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-13: bdud kyis bdud kyi zhags pa mdun du bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-14: de yi 'dod pa bdud stobs thams cad dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-15: de tshe bskyed nas bdud bsten 'jigs byas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-16: nag po'i rtsa lag de yis gtse ma nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-17: bar chad bya bar rab tu ma tshugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-18: de nas shin tu mi bzad srin po ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-19: bye ba dag gis tshig rtsub smra bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-20: dpag tu med cing bsam yas mu med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-21: lus bong mtha' yas mngon sprul tshig rtsub smra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-22: mdung thung mda' bo che yis rgyob cig rgyob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-23: 'di yi klad pa myur du ri yis chom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-24: 'di yi snying la gzi brjid yod pa phrogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-25: myur du dus las 'da' zhing 'gog par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-26: thang gcig tsam yang 'di ni srog ma sbyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:222b-27: ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan bde bsten na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-2: nga yi yang dag tshig de thos nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-3: rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'phel bar ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-4: de tshe bong bu'i rnam pa mngon sprul pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-5: mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa dag byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-6: srin po rnams ni sgra bo che dag 'bod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-7: la la mdung dang mda' bo che dag thogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-8: la la dag kyang ri ni khyer ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-9: la la sdang ba'i sems kyis sbrul 'dzin cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-10: de yi mdun du shin tu sgra dag 'byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-11: de tshe la la gnod sbyin mngon sprul te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-12: lus gcig pa dang lus gnyis lag pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-13: gsum dag yod cing lus bzhi lag pa gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-14: de tshe lus gcig mngon par sprul byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-15: de tshe de bzhin mgo bzhi mngon par sprul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-16: de nas lus gcig mngon par sprul byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-17: de dag bong bu ra dang byi la dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-18: stag gi gdong ste 'jigs par byed pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-19: so so mi 'dra ba yi skad dag 'byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-20: bong bu'i gdong ni ra yi skad 'byin cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223a-21: ra yi gdong ni bong bu'i skad 'byin la //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223b-15: byi la wa ni bag gi skad 'byin la //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:223b-25: 'jig rten phan mdzad pa spu'i khung ma g-yos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:224a-1: ni nam mkha' lding gi skad 'byin cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:224a-2: de tshe de bzhin glang po rta skad 'byin //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:224a-4: bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:224a-5: nam mkha' lding ni khu byug skad 'byin cing //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:224a-19: rnam 'dren de la gtso bar ma nus shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:224a-20: bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so //
