K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432a-19: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong phyi ma'i mtha' sgrub pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432a-21: las kyi gtam de lta bu dag smras pa na sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo; ;moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar @432b 'dod pas las rnam par gzhag pa gsum la bslab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-2: ngas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes par bya ba'i don du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa sems can rnams la ji ltar yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya snyam nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che ba sna tshogs dpag tu med pa dag mngon par 'dus byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-4: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na drang srong 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che zhing gzi brjid che la mthu che ba; phyi rol gyi lam gyis 'dod pa dag gi 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-5: lnga mngon par shes pa zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-6: yid kyis 'dus byas thams cad la yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-7: 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad 'jig par rjes su lta ba na de 'di snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-8: gang gis mi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-9: mi 'gag pa'i chos gang yang yod dam snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-11: chos gang mngon par 'dus byas pa de 'gog par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:432b-12: mngon par 'du mi byed pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-1: pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor rtog pa na mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i chos thams cad la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-2: de rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas nas sems kyi rgyud la gang dang gang skye ba de dang de sems kyi rgyud nyid la so sor rtog cing rab tu rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-3: sems kyi dbang gis chos thams cad skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-4: sems kyi dbang gis chos thams cad 'gag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-5: ji lta ji ltar sems kyi rtog pa de lta de ltar chos thams cad kyi gzugs ston par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-7: chos thams cad skyed par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-9: chos thams cad 'gog par byed do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-11: sems 'di'i sems kyi stobs bskyed pa gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-13: sems gzugs med cing bstan du med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-14: skye ba na sems bdag nyid mi shes shing 'gag pa na'ang sems bdag nyid mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-15: sems kyis sems de mi bskyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-16: sems kyis sems mi 'gog pa'i sems 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-17: sems kyi ngo bo yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433a-18: gzugs can ma yin pa'i chos 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-0: sems 'gog pa rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa de 'byung zhing sems @433b kyi rgyud rab tu 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-1: sems gang 'gog pa na sems kyi rgyud 'dra bar rab tu 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-2: sdang ba'i sems 'gog pa de sems kyi rgyud 'dra bar rab tu 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-3: gti mug gi sems 'gog pa de sems kyi rgyud 'dra bar rab tu 'jug cing sems kyi rgyud la chags pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-5: gang gi tshe de shes pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe sems kyi rgyud gsum po thams cad rab tu shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-8: mi la la zhig mun par snod yongs su tshol ba na til mar gyi mar me bus na de snang ba des snod de mthong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-9: de las gzhan pa'i snod dag kyang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-10: de bzhin du gal te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa'i sems 'gags shing gang shes pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i sems skye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-11: sems kyi rgyud de dag thams cad rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-12: gal te gnod sems kyi kun nas dkris pa'i sems 'gags shing shes pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i sems skye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-13: sems kyi rgyud de dag thams cad rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-14: gal te gti mug gis kun nas dkris pa'i sems 'gags shing shes pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i sems skye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:433b-15: sems kyi rgyud de dag thams cad rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-0: de de ltar rab tu shes @434a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-1: na; nyon mongs pa'i sems kyi rnam pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-2: rnam par shes pa gang gis sems de rab tu ldan par mthong ba'i sems de'ang mi dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-5: nga rgyal nyid kyis sems de'i sems kyi ngo bo dang bral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-6: chos ngo bo gang yang med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-8: gang mi skye ba de mi 'gag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-9: gang mi skye zhing mi 'gag pa de mngon par shes par byar med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-10: yongs su shes par byar med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-13: mngon sum du byar med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-14: de da ltar gyi dus ci 'dra ba 'das pa'ang de 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-15: 'das pa ci 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa'ang de 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-16: de mngon par shes par byar med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-17: yongs su shes par byar med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-20: mngon sum du byar med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-21: gang dus gsum mnyam pa 'di la byis pa so so'i skye bo kun tu rmongs pa dag phung po dben pa las byang chub tshol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-23: phung po dag las gzhan ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-24: snyam nas de ting nge 'dzin de las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-25: rang bzhin de dag sems can la ston to; ;gang slob pa de la slob pa de dag gis rjes su thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434a-26: gang sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-2: 'on kyang chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-3: de'i skye ba'ang mya ngan las 'das pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-4: mi skye ba'ang mya ngan las 'das pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-5: 'gags pa'ang mya ngan las 'das pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-6: ma 'gags pa'ang mya ngan las 'das pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-7: dngos po'ang mya ngan las 'das pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-8: dngos po med pa'ang mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-9: de de ltar chos ston pa na sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-12: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po drang srong 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-13: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-15: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po drang srong 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:434b-16: ngas dus gsum mnyam pa de rab tu bstan pa na sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la rab tu btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-0: byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi chos bstan par bya @435a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-1: ste; dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la sems can dag rab tu gzud par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-2: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la sems can dag rab tu btsud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-3: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-5: ngas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes par bya ba'i don du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-6: mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-7: de bzhin du sbyar te bdag gis ji ltar yang dag par bshad par bya snyam pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-9: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na bram ze zla dga' zhes bya ba shing s'a la chen po lta bu zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-10: pha ma shin tu dag pa dang ldan zhing chung ma'i skye gnas ma btang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-14: sgra nges par sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-15: shes gsal dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-16: yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa lnga pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-17: sngon byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435a-18: 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i gzhi lung ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-0: skyes bu chen @435b po'i mtshan nyid dag la rjes su shes shing yongs su shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-1: rig pa gsum gyi tshig la bri ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-2: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-4: mu stegs gdol ba thams cad la kun tu slong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-5: de slong mo'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-6: snyam nas sems can thams cad kyi lto 'gengs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-7: nyi ma stong du ston mo byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-11: lnga stong du'ang ston mo byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-12: thabs des lo 'bum phrag brgyad du zla ba'i mchod sbyin rab tu bsgrubs shing lo 'bum phrag brgyad du gang la sems rab tu nyams pa yon gnas su la'ang yongs su ma zhus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-13: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba de'i 'dus pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-15: skar ma dang mnyam par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-16: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'ang skar ma dang mnyam par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-17: de nas bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:435b-18: bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi bkad sar ya mtshan can kun phal cher 'jug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba'i nyan thos 'ba' zhig mi 'jug cing @436a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba'ang mi 'jug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436a-2: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi bkad sar 'jug par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436a-3: de bdag gi mchod sbyin de la rtog ste; mchod sbyin gyi skyon gyi nyes pa gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mchod sbyin gyi bkad sa 'dir mi 'jug snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ni; dus su za ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436a-6: bdag gi sbyin pa chen po 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436a-8: skyon des de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi bkad sar mi 'jug pa lta zhig snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436a-9: de nas bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu nang par sngar langs nas bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436a-10: bram ze mo rab tu mang po dag gis yongs su bskor mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba ga la ba der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-0: bram ze'i tshogs mang pos yongs @436b su bskor nas thams cad rta rgod ma dkar mo'i shing rta la zhon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-1: de bzhon pa'i sa ji tsam pa de tsam du bzhon pas song ba nas babs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-2: de rkang pa'i bar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba ga la ba der song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-3: des de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba de shing ljon pa gzhan zhig gi drung na gnas shing bzhugs te bzang zhing mdzes la dbang po dul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-5: zhi gnas dul ba dam pa brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-6: zhi gnas dul ba mchog brnyes pa sbas pa; glang po ltar dbang po thul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-7: mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la rab tu gsal ba gser gyi mchod sdong ltar 'bar ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-8: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-9: gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba 'di dge slong gi tshogs su shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-10: bdag gis rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-14: phul du byung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-15: phul du byung ba'i gnas su bzhugs par bya zhing phul du byung ba'i zhal zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-17: snyun rkyen gyi gsos sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bstod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:436b-18: snyam nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-1: gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba de'i phyag gnyis la bzung nas khas yongs su gtugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-4: bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-6: bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-8: rus lan gsum gyi bar du gsol cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-9: bcom ldan 'das dge slong ma lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-10: phul du byung bar gnas pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-11: gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs su bgrangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-14: bdag nongs par gzung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-15: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par ji srid bzhugs kyi bar du gzims cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-16: snyun rkyen gsos sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bdag mchod pa bgyid par bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437a-17: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad @437b dang bral bas bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-1: zla dga' shin tu bde bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-8: gang gzhan yang lus chen por 'dug pa dag bde ba 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-11: gang zag gcig gi phyir ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-14: 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ngo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-15: sems can gang dag zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-18: gnas rab tu nyams pa de rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-20: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la dgung bdun du bde ba'i rim gro thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-21: dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag yo byad kun gyis mchod pa bgyid par de gnang par mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:437b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba des bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu la thugs brtse ba'i slad du cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-1: shing s'a la chen po lta bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba de cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas bdag gi gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rang gi gnyen bsdus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-2: de bsdus nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-3: gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de zhag bdun du yo byad thams cad kyis gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa khyed shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-4: de la khyed nus pa ci yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-5: mthu ci yod pa'i lus kyis 'bad par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-10: zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-12: gang de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhag bdun du yo byad thams cad la spyan drangs par shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-13: de la khyed nus pa ci yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-14: mthu ci yod pa'i stobs gyis 'bad par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438a-15: de dag gis kyang legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438b-5: zho shas 'tsho ba thams cad dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi khyams brtsigs te; gdan bshams shing yo byad dbul ba thams cad kyang bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438b-6: de mtshan mo de 'das nas pho nyas de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i dus la bab lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438b-7: gang gi dus la da bab par mkhyen na gdugs tshod lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438b-10: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi de de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ltar nyan nas zla dga'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan shoms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438b-14: der 'khor gyi khyams byas te tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis la zheng du'ang dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor gyi khyams byas nas klu'i rgyal po la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438b-16: gang bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa sang gdugs tshod gsol bar bya ba shes par mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:438b-20: des gnod sbyin rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-1: dang bcas pa de'i gdan shoms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-3: zhes gnod sbyin rnams kyis zla dga'i ltar nyan nas kun nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis su gdan bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-4: klu'i rgyal po de'ang spos chu'i chag chag 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-5: des dri za rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-7: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de gdugs tshod gsol pa na khyed rnams kyis rol mo'i sgra longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-8: des grul bum rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-10: khyed rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bla bre bres par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-11: des klu'i rgyal po rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-13: khyod kyis rlung bsil ba gtong bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol ba na tsha bar 'gyur ba med par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-15: bdag nyid kyi 'khor gyi khams klu'i dbang po de'i rgyan kun tu bre ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-17: mu tig gi bla bres kyang yang dag par g-yogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439a-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba nang par sngar chos gos gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-0: lhung bzed bsnams nas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la @439b chen po lta bu gdugs tshod sbyor ba ga la ba der gshegs nas gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-1: g-yon rol du dge slong gi dge 'dun no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-2: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs ma thag tu klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-3: dri za rnams 'dus nas rol mo'i sgra mngon par rab tu len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-4: bar snang las lha'i spos kyi phye ma mngon par rab tu 'thor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-6: de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas 'khor gyi khyams de kun nas dpag tshad brgya par 'dug la beed'urya'i ra bas bskor cing shel gyi kha ran yongs su btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-7: de nas drang srong zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-9: myang ba zhim po rab tu mang bas yang dag par brims /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-10: yang dag par tshim par byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-11: lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag yang dag par rab tu blangs; lha'i bdug spos dag gis bdugs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:439b-13: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-0: @440a *// gdugs tshod gsol bar rig nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la dpag bsam gyi ras bcos bu zung gis mngon par g-yogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-2: zla ba nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i bar dag gis yongs su gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-3: de nas drang srong zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol bar rig nas lhung bzed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-4: chab phul te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-6: bdag gi sbyin pa sems can thams cad la stsal bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-8: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'dzum pa mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-9: ji lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad pas zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-10: nyi ma nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i lha dang mi rnams kyi bar la gser gyi 'od kyi mdog gis khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440a-11: de nas drang srong zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440b-0: gang bcom ldan 'das @440b kyi 'od btang ba 'dis ji tsam du sems can rnams la reg pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mi phyed pa'i dad pa skyes lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440b-1: bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rnam par smin pa gang lags pa de sems can thams cad la stsal bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440b-2: bcom ldan 'das gang 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i rgyu gang lags; rkyen gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440b-3: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440b-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba des bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440b-6: ji tsam du 'od 'dis reg pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440b-7: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi don byas te phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:440b-8: de dag thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sa bon de bskyed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can de dag thams cad @441a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bur gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-5: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-6: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze zla dga' shing s'a la chen po lta bur gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-7: ngas sems can de dag lung bstan par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de la sems rab tu dang bas zhag bdun du bkur sti byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-8: bla mar byas te rjed cing mchod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa des nga lung ma bstan kyang nga'i sems zhum pa'ang med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-10: nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-14: byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i phyir snyom las med par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-15: rim gro bya ba la snyom las med par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441a-16: myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-0: ngas skye ba shes par bya ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdag bla na med pa @441b yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas skye ba shes pa sems can rnams la ji ltar yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-1: sems can dag skye ba shes pa thos nas chos bdag med pa nyid brjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-2: skye ba'ang ji ltar ston par 'gyur snyam nas dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dpag tu med pa dag mngon par 'dus byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-4: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na rgyal po grags chen zhes bya ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-8: phyi rol gyi lam gyis 'dod pa rnams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-9: de mi thams cad kyi tshes bco lnga ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-10: zla ba nya la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi 'dun khang du bgro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-11: de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu chos kyi bgro ba byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-13: gal te brgya la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na chos gang dag ston pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-15: de'i tshe rgyal po tog gi blo gros zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-16: rgyal po khyab 'jug blo gros zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:441b-17: rgyal po zla ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442a-3: rgyal po shugs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442a-8: gang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu chos bgro ba byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442a-10: chos smra bdag gi phyogs su bya zhing chos ma yin pa smra bdag gi mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442a-11: yang dag par smra ba dag gi phyogs su bya zhing yang dag pa ma yin pa smra ba dag gi mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442a-12: zhi ba smra ba dag gi phyogs su bya zhing zhi ba ma yin pa smra ba dag gi mi bya /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442a-17: bdag med pa smra ba dag gi phyogs su bya zhing bdag tu smra ba dag gi mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan @442b 'das kyis nang dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-2: de la lha'i 'khor mang po dag gis sgra chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-3: sgra gsal bar smras pa; grogs po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-4: stong pa nyid la las mngon par 'du byed pa ji ltar yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-5: gal te bdag dang bdag gi med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-6: lha'i 'khor 'di las mngon par 'dus byas pa gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skyes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-7: lha'i 'khor gzhan gyis sgra che zhing sgra gsal bar smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi bstan pa la skur pa ma 'debs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-10: ltas lnga dag byung nas lha'i bu dag 'chi zhing skye ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-11: khyed kyi mngon sum yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-12: ci lha'i bu 'chi ba'i bdag po mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-13: bdag la gnod pa de dag gang zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-15: ltas dang po la bdag mi snang ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-21: shi ba'i bdag mi snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:442b-23: bdag gi med cing chos thams cad ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-4: dzambu'i gling gi mi rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-5: dam pa'i chos dang mngon du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-6: re zhig dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-7: snyam nas de'i tshe lha de dag lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba'i char phab cing mgu bar gyur nas ji ltar 'dir dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod nas 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-8: de nas rgyal po tog gi blo gros kyis rgyal po'i pho nya gzhan zhig la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-10: gangs ri'i rgyal po 'di'i rtse mo'i dbus na drang srong dge ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-11: rgyal po'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag khyod mthong bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-13: rgyal po'i pho nya des bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po de'i ltar nyan nas 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-15: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag dar bskum pa las brkyang ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444a-16: brkyang ba las bskum pa de bzhin du rgyal po'i pho nya de rgyal po'i 'khor de'i mdun nas mi snang bar song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-0: drang srong de'i rkang pa'i drung du phyin nas rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te @444b rang bzhin de dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-1: de de bzhin gshegs pas 'dzin yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i sgra thos shing rang bzhin de dag shes nas snying rje ba'i phyir mchi ma byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-2: de'i mchi ma de dag gi rgyun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-3: mchi ma de dag gi drod kyis gangs ri'i rgyal po'i rtse mo zhu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-4: de mchi ma de dag phyis nas rgyal po'i pho nya la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-6: gal te gang de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-7: thos pa'i sems can gang dag yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-10: dam pa'i chos ma nub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-15: nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa zhi ba btang nas 'du 'dzir 'jug mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-20: zhes lha rnams dang rtsod pa byung ba de'i byas pa 'di khyod la tshol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:444b-29: 'chi ba med cing de sbyin pa la dga' bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-0: de la de skad bstan pas de'i chos kyi mig chos rnams la rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag @445a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-2: de nas pho nya de 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-4: nam mkha' la ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar rgyal po de dag gi 'khor du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-5: de bar snang las 'od bzhin du sgra byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-9: gang dag mngon par brtson pas ni; de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las snying po len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-10: mngon par brtson pa med pa dag la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-12: chos thos pa med; dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-13: de mi brtson pas gang de dag phyir ldog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-14: gang mngon par brtson pa la dam pa'i chos gnas te; 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-15: 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-16: chos thams cad bdag med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-20: de'i sgra de phyogs bcur rlung gis khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-21: de'i sgra de thos nas gang bdag tu smra ba de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-23: gang bdag med par smra ba de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-24: bya ba byas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445a-25: de dag thams cad tog gi blo gros kyi mthu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-0: de'i tshe @445b de'i dus na rgyal po tog gi blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-1: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-3: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tog gi blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-4: ngas skye bo de dag thams cad chos la rab tu btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgras go bar byas te; ji ltar 'dir sngon gyi spyod pas sangs rgyas khri dag la bsnyen bkur byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-6: sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed nas sgra de btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la bag tsha ba med pa'i shes pas sengge'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o; ;moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-10: ngas skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes par bya ba'i don nas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-12: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer brgya ba zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:445b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag bar 'du ba 'dir rtag tu gnod pa dang bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446a-0: 'od zer de re re las sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dpag tu @446a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446a-2: de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med par sprul pa de dag sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa ji ltar mos pa ji ltar mos par sprul pas yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446a-3: ji ltar sems can de dag gi bsam pa de ltar sprul pa de dag gis sems can de dag la chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446a-4: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med par gyur te; thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sprul pa dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446a-5: bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med par bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446a-6: byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag smin par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446a-7: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rim gro ba dge slong mig nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446a-8: de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa gang gis sems can dag yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa la mkhas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446a-9: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston par mdzad pa de'i tshe sems can de dag la chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446b-0: de chos bstan @446b pa thos nas rim gro byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446b-1: sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag de'i rim gro byas pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gyur to; ;moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na rim gro ba dge slong mig nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na; khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446b-4: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mig nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446b-5: ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos bstan pa thos nas sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag phyir mi ldog pa la btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446b-8: byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa dag dang phrad par byas nas ser sna med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa mnyan par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446b-9: byang chub sems dpa' yang yongs su smin bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:446b-11: ngas skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes par bya ba'i don du mngon par 'dus byas pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-0: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba nas @447a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams de spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-3: sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i sems can g-yo med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-6: 'jig rten pha rol gyi kha na mtho ba la 'jigs par lta ba rnams kyis gang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-7: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-8: byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag brgyad rnams kyi gtso bo yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-9: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-10: sems can rnams kyi bya ba la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-11: sems can rnams kyi chos ston pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-12: sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'gro ba'i dus la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-13: sems can rnams la de dang 'tsham pa'i chos ston pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas de la bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-0: de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du rkang pa bzhag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can dag sangs rgyas byung bar yang dag par rab tu @447b shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-4: rab tu dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang 'od gser gyi mdog gis khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-6: de nas sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der snang ba 'di dag phyogs gang nas 'ongs zhes ya mtshan du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-7: de nas bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bas khyab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-9: gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa de dag thal mo sbyor la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar smros shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-10: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-12: de nas sems can de dag gis sgra de thos nas bar snang la thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-13: khyod kyis bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig sprod cig ces sgra phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-14: de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa bye ba brgya phrag stong dag mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:447b-15: sems can re res sprul pa re re yang dag par shes kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-0: de'i nyi ma gcig gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri phrag dpag tu med pa rnams su byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag dpag @448a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-1: tu med pa dag phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pa'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-4: brtson 'grus bskyed par mdzad pa na byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-5: rigs kyi bu; song la nga'i 'od kyi rjes snyogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-6: gang du nga'i 'od gnas par mthong ba de tsam du nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-7: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi 'od gser gyi kha dog btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-8: de rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'od de dag gi rjes su song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-9: de bskal pa grangs med par 'od de dag gi rjes su song yang 'od de'i gnas ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-10: de bskal pa grangs med par song bas lus snyom zhing sgyid lug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-11: de nas bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi sku byung nas de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-13: ngal ba'i rgyu yid la ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448a-14: sgyid lug par ma byed par re zhig cung zhig gi ring du song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon @448b bar 'du mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-1: de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas de'i lus kyi ngal ba bsal nas lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus sangs rgyas kyi mthus yang dag par 'dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-2: de'ang bskal pa grangs med par song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-3: rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa zhig mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-4: de'i pha rol na 'od mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-5: de de'i tshe bla gos phyogs gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-6: thugs la dri ma bral zhing sbyor ba spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-7: khyod kyis 'jig rten khams kun thugs su chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-8: 'dren pa khyod kyi 'od ni ci 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-9: 'di la yul gyi mtha' 'di rjes su 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-10: de'i tshe bar snang las rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-11: khang pa brtsegs pa der sangs rgyas kyi gzugs byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-12: de byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pa de la tshigs su bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-13: gang dag nga yi rkang pa'i drung 'dug dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-14: gang dag yul 'di yin ni mthar 'dug pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-15: thams cad nga yi sgra dag thos 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:448b-16: 'di yi sgrub pa thams cad shes par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-0: stobs bcu sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres @449a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-1: pa; ;brtan pa 'di dag srog chags kun la bden //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-2: yul gyi rang bzhin yul gyi dngos dang bzo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-3: de bzhin yul gyi tshig dag kun shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-4: rgyal ba nga yi zhing 'dir sems can dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-5: tshig 'di thos nas dad par mi 'gyur med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-6: thams cad bla na med pa'i sa la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-7: de dag rgyal ba'i chos las ldog mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-8: gang dag nyan thos lhan cig thun mong ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-9: de dag ma yin 'di ni rnam 'dren chos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-10: rgyal sras gang la rab tu sems dang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-11: bdud kyi skyon bcom byang chub reg par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-15: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-16: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-17: ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od dang bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis kyi bar du rjes su 'brel to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449a-18: ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mthus ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad tshigs su @449b bcad pa de dag gis mngon par go bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449b-3: byang chub sems dpas pha'i stobs kyi go cha bgo bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la'ang the tshom med cing som nyi med par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449b-5: bam po nyi shu bzhi pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449b-7: ngas skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes par bya ba'i don du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas ji ltar yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya snyam pa'i bar dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dpag tu med pa dag mngon par 'dus byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449b-8: moonggal gyi bu; sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches rol na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i mig ces bya ba byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:449b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shugs 'chang zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bdun gyi gtso bo byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-3: thabs la mkhas pa zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-4: de de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag cham du 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-5: sems can gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-6: nyan thos kyi theg pa de dag kyang yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de la'ang rim gro byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-8: mthong ba'i chos de la bde bar ngas pa dag gis gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-9: de'i 'jig rten gyi khams khri phrag brgyad cu nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bar gyi sems can rnams la sprul pa gtong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-10: sprul pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su smin par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-11: yongs su sbyong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pas byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shugs 'chang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams khri phrag dpag tu med pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-15: ji ltar sems can dmyal ba med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450a-16: dud 'gro'i skye gnas med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-0: gshin rje'i 'jig @450b rten med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-1: lha ma yin gyi ris med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-2: ji ltar mi khom pa thams cad med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su smin par nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-4: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-5: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shugs 'chang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-7: skad cig gcig gis bgyi ba yongs su rdzogs par rdo thogs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-12: da ltar gyi skye rgu tshe ring ba tshe'i tshad bskal pa khri phrag dpag tu med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-13: gang byang chub sems dpa' le lo kun yod pa tshe'i ngo bo gcig thob pas yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:450b-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dis sangs rgyas khri phrag dpag tu med pa rnams kyis yang dang yang du nga'i mig gis mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa yongs su spyad de; de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas mang pos yongs su ma btul ba gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-0: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di de ltar sangs rgyas @451a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-1: mang pos yongs su smin par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-2: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nye bar byung ba de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-5: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su smin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-6: yongs su sbyong bar bya bar nges pa skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-8: khyed kyang sangs rgyas khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed; shes rab rno ba snying rje mtshungs pa med pa dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-9: khyod kyi tshe gcig po 'dis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-10: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-11: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shugs 'chang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-12: gal te bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451a-13: gang bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sems can rnams la glo ba brtse bar bzung ste bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bskal pa grangs ma mchis par me ma mur gyi 'obs du ba ma mchis par mchis pa de'ang spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-0: de skad @451b ces gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa de phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shugs 'chang des de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gdung rgya cher byas nas mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' de rjes su dran pa na sems can rnams la snying brtse bar bzung nas sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dpag tu med pa dag mngon par sprul to; ;des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis me tog bzhin kun tu bkang nas de tshe'i 'du byed btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-5: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shugs 'chang zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-6: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-7: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shugs 'chang zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-8: ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis me tog bzhin kun tu bkang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-9: sangs rgyas kyi gdung yang dag par spel /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:451b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rgya cher byas te mchod pa byas nas dus byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452a-1: gyi bu; de lta bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452a-2: byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par byas nas phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452a-4: ngas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes par bya ba'i don du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa sems can rnams la ji ltar yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya snyam nas dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dpag tu med pa dag mngon par 'dus byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452a-6: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba mdzangs shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452a-7: sems can rnams kyi dbang po'i tshogs rtog pa la mkhas pa zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452a-8: sems can gang dag gzugs la mos pa de dag gi gzugs la 'dod chags pa yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin rab tu shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-0: de sems can 'di dag gzugs la 'dod chags pas yongs su gdungs shing gzugs @452b la 'dod chags pas bsregs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-1: de sems can de dag gi gzugs la 'dod chags spong ba'i thabs sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-2: thabs gang gis sems can de dag gzugs la 'dod chags ma skyes pa mi bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-4: sems can 'di dag gzugs la 'dod chags pas shin tu gdungs 'dod chags kyis yongs su bsregs pa'i sems des 'chi ba'i dus byas shing de dag sems can dmyal bar skye bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-5: 'dod chags kyi me des shin tu gdungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-6: de'i rkyen gyis sems can dmyal ba pa'i mes gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-7: de dag shin tu gdung ba gnyis kyis 'ching ba'i zhags pa las mi 'grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-8: sdug bsngal gyi gnod pas skye ba na'ang 'brel /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-10: 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba na'ang 'brel to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-11: snyam nas de thabs tshol ba na 'di ltar yongs su 'jal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-12: byis pa dag rtog pa'i dbang gis gtsang ba'i 'du shes kyis 'ching ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-13: stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo dang bral ba kha dog tsam gnyis pa tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:452b-16: 'di la gtsang ba nyid gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453a-0: mgal me bskor ba snang ba bzhin du log par @453a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453a-1: 'dzin pas 'dod chags 'jug pa gtsang bar 'brel pa de shin tu 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453a-5: 'khor bar shin tu rgyug pa dag sngon gyi mtha' mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453a-6: snyam nas de sems can de dag gi gang mi gtsang ba yang dang yang du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453a-7: de de dag gi mi gtsang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu ston pa na sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa rnams kyis mi gtsang bar 'du shes pa yongs su shes shing mi gtsang ba'i blor zhugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453a-8: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453a-9: yongs su shes nas sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes kyis bzlog nas 'dod pa dag gis 'dod chags dang bral nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453a-12: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sems can kun gyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453a-13: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-0: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sems @453b can kun gyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-1: ngas srog chags khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi gtsang ba'i 'dus shes kyis bzlog nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-2: de dag thams cad kyang gzugs kyi rang bzhin rab tu shes shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-5: byang chub sems dpas gzugs kyi rang bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-6: de bzhin du sems can rnams la'ang bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-7: byang chub sems dpas gzugs kyi rang bzhin rab tu shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-8: de bzhin du sems can rnams la'ang rab tu ston pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-11: ngas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes par bya ba'i don du zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-12: de bzhin du sbyar te yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:453b-14: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na drang srong chos la nges pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-3: phyi rol gyi lam gyis 'dod pa rnams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-4: de 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa me long gi dkyil 'khor du snang ba ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-5: ji ltar me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs kyi rnam pa mthong ba med pa de ltar 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa mthong ba'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-7: dngos po yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-8: chos gang dngos po med pa de spang bar mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-9: yongs su shes par mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-11: mngon sum du mi bya ba yin na; 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-12: 'dod pa'i yon tan don du gnyer ba de dag de'i rnam pa la spyod par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-15: me long gi gzugs kyi rnam pa la de ltar tshul bzhin du so sor brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-16: mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-17: chos thams cad la'ang me long gi dkyil 'khor du snang ba bzhin du 'du shes thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454a-18: de sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag bzod pa de la rab tu btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-0: moonggal @454b gyi bu; de ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-1: de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chos la nges pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-2: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-3: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chos la nges pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-4: ngas de'i tshe sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa de dag me long gi dkyil 'khor du snang ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-7: de lta bas na; byang chub sems dpas me long gi dkyil 'khor du snang ba lta bu'i chos rnams la sems gzhug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-8: me long gi dkyil 'khor du snang ba lta bu'i chos rnams la sems zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-11: ngas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes par bya ba'i don du zhes bya ba nas dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:454b-12: de bzhin du rgya cher sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-0: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na drang srong aud dzya datta zhes bya @455a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-3: mthu che ba zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-4: de ji snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-5: gang bdag gis chos rtogs ba'i chos de dag las chos mngon par byung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-6: chos gya nom pa'i chos gzhan gang yang yod dam snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-8: gang bdag gis chos khong du chud pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-10: chos gang 'gog pa med pa'i chos de gong du ches mngon par byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-11: ches gya nom snang bar 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-13: chos gang dag skyes pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-15: gang skyes pa med pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-16: 'gog pa med pa'i chos so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-18: chos gang skyes pa med pa de gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-20: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-21: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-23: ngo bo nyid med pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-25: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-27: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455a-29: de de ltar tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-0: des @455b mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa de la sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag rab tu btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-3: de ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong aud dzya datta zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-4: khyod kyis de ltar mi bsta lte /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-5: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong aud dzya da tta zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-6: ngas sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la rab tu btsud cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-7: don dam pa'ang 'dzin du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-10: byang chub sems dpas mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la rab tu gnas par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-11: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-12: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-13: moonggal gyi bu; ngas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur pa'i lam shes par bya ba'i don du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:455b-15: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:456a-0: de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na drang srong lhag mthong spyad pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che zhing gzi @456a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:456a-1: brjid che la mthu che ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:456a-2: phyi rol gyi lam gyis 'dod pa rnams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:456a-3: de 'di snyam du sems te; 'dod pa'i zag pa 'byung ba gang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:456a-7: yul yid la byed pa las gzhan ma yin te; yid la byed pa med pas mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:456a-8: 'dod pa'i zag pa 'gog pa las gzhan ma yin pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:456a-10: de de ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na 'dod pa'i zag pa bdag med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i don gyi lam bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:456a-11: ji ltar lam 'dis 'dod pa'i zag pa 'gags nas mi skye ba de bzhin du lam 'dis zag pa thams cad 'gags te mi skye'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:474b-16: sems can med pas mya ngan las 'das pa ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:474b-24: mya ngan las 'das pa yin no snyam mo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:475b-13: de dben par song nas nang du yang dag par bzhag pa dang sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:480a-8: phyi rol gyi lam gyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kun mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:480b-0: de chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dang bral ba rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu rtsa bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rdul phra mo snyed du rgyu zhing ngo bo nyid thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston pa na de bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma de dag tu sems can khri phrag brjod du med pa dag @480b mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la rab tu btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:480b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong shes pa thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:480b-4: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:480b-6: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong shes pa thogs pa med pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:480b-7: ngas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar sems can khri phrag brjod du med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la rab tu btsud do; ;moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:480b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rab tu gnas par bya zhing mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la rab tu gnas par bya'o; ;moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:480b-10: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:480b-11: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-0: ngas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes par bya ba'i don du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams lam rig pa'i zag @481a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-1: pa shes pa ji ltar yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya snyam nas dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dpag tu med pa dag mngon par 'dus byas so; ;moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-2: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa nas de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na drang srong sgrib pa med par shes pa mthong ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che la gzi brjid che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-3: phyi rol gyi lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-4: de dben par song ste nang du yang dag bzhag pa dang sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-11: chos kyi sgrib pa'ang gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-14: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-18: nam mkha'i sgrib pa mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-21: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-22: snyam nas de dran pa yang dag par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs te; grogs po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481a-24: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir chos gang zhig chos gang la'ang sgrib pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-0: de'i sgra de thos @481b nas grogs po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-2: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-3: zhes phyogs bzhi'i rlung gis thogs pa med par khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-4: de'i sgra de sems can khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis thos nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong sgrib pa med par shes pa mthong ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-9: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-11: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong sgrib pa med par shes pa mthong ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-12: ngas sgra bsgrags pa de phyogs bzhi'i rlung gis thogs pa med par khyer ba sems can 'khod pa de dag gis chos thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-13: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-14: zhes thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-17: byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dang bral ba la brtson par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-18: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:481b-19: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes zab cing rgya che ba ngo mtshar lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-3: de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-4: ji tsam du sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i sems can 'dul bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-6: rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams don du gnyer ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-7: bsod nams tshol ba gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongs su bkang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed kyi bskal par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-9: gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-10: 'chang zhing gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par rab tu ston tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-11: tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chad pa 'di ni; de bas bsod nams tshogs mang du gsog lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482a-12: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis moonggal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' @482b stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-6: yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can dag sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i dngos po nyid thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i dbu de snyed du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag re re'i dbu ji snyed pa la zhal de snyed du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-9: de dag re re'i zhal ji snyed pa la ljags de snyed du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-13: ye shes dpag tu med pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-14: ye shes dpag gis mi lang ba dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-15: ye shes grangs med pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-16: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-17: ye shes gzhal du med pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-18: ye shes gzhal gyis mi lang ba dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-21: ye shes brjod du med pa dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:482b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:483a-1: gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:483a-2: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo sde rin po che'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:483a-3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a wa rma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:483a-4: lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes snying pos bsgyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:483a-5: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha sidha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-001:483a-7: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa;;
